# Configuration for api_instruction_count_benchmarks.
duration_seconds=1,
cache_size_mb=2000,
validate=false,
in_memory=true,
sweep_interval=1000,
workload_manager=
(
    populate_config=(
        collection_count=1,
        key_count_per_collection=1,
        key_size=4,
        value_size=1
    ),
    custom_config=
    (
        thread_count=1,
        key_size=4,
        op_rate=1s
    ),
    checkpoint_config=
    (
        thread_count=0
    )
),
operation_tracker=
(
    enabled=false,
)
